content.text: Match ends, Arsenal 2, Boca Juniors 2.
Second Half ends, Arsenal 2, Boca Juniors 2.
Substitution, Boca Juniors. Cristian Erbes replaces Leandro Somoza.
Substitution, Boca Juniors. Matías Caruzzo replaces Rolando Schiavi.
Offside, Boca Juniors. Juan Román Riquelme tries a through ball, but Diego Rivero is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Juan Román Riquelme (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the top left corner.
Carl Jenkinson (Arsenal) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Pablo Mouche (Boca Juniors) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Carl Jenkinson (Arsenal).
Attempt missed. Emmanuel Eboué (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aaron Ramsey.
Attempt blocked. Juan Román Riquelme (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Rivero.
Substitution, Boca Juniors. Nicolás Colazo replaces Walter Erviti because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Walter Erviti (Boca Juniors) because of an injury.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Rolando Schiavi.
Attempt blocked. Juan Román Riquelme (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pablo Mouche.
Armand Traore (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pablo Mouche (Boca Juniors).
Goal!  Arsenal 2, Boca Juniors 2. Pablo Mouche (Boca Juniors) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Substitution, Arsenal. Emmanuel Eboué replaces Andrey Arshavin.
Goal!  Arsenal 2, Boca Juniors 1. Lucas Viatri (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Juan Román Riquelme following a fast break.
Offside, Boca Juniors. Rolando Schiavi tries a through ball, but Pablo Mouche is caught offside.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Facundo Roncaglia.
Substitution, Boca Juniors. Pablo Mouche replaces Darío Cvitanich.
Foul by Marouane Chamakh (Arsenal).
Darío Cvitanich (Boca Juniors) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Juan Román Riquelme (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Lucas Viatri.
Attempt missed. Leandro Somoza (Boca Juniors) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Juan Román Riquelme following a corner.
Corner,  Boca Juniors. Conceded by Carl Jenkinson.
Corner,  Boca Juniors. Conceded by Vito Mannone.
Attempt saved. Lucas Viatri (Boca Juniors) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Román Riquelme.
Foul by Emmanuel Frimpong (Arsenal).
Diego Rivero (Boca Juniors) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Andrey Arshavin (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Emmanuel Frimpong.
Juan Insaurralde (Boca Juniors) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Marouane Chamakh (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Juan Insaurralde (Boca Juniors).
Offside, Boca Juniors. Juan Román Riquelme tries a through ball, but Clemente Rodríguez is caught offside.
Diego Rivero (Boca Juniors) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Emmanuel Frimpong (Arsenal).
Hand ball by Facundo Roncaglia (Boca Juniors).
Offside, Boca Juniors. Leandro Somoza tries a through ball, but Darío Cvitanich is caught offside.
Substitution, Boca Juniors. Clemente Rodríguez replaces Franco Sosa because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Franco Sosa (Boca Juniors) because of an injury.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Juan Insaurralde.
Goal!  Arsenal 2, Boca Juniors 0. Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Carlos Vela.
Substitution, Arsenal. Sébastien Squillaci replaces Laurent Koscielny.
Second Half begins Arsenal 1, Boca Juniors 0.
Substitution, Arsenal. Carlos Vela replaces Gervinho.
Substitution, Arsenal. Vito Mannone replaces Lukasz Fabianski.
Substitution, Arsenal. Marouane Chamakh replaces Robin van Persie.
Substitution, Arsenal. Aaron Ramsey replaces Jack Wilshere.
